channel.title: 🏢 University of Buffalo on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Buffalo on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: ParallelEdits: Efficient Multi-Aspect Text-Driven Image Editing with Attention Grouping
item.description: ParallelEdits efficiently edits multiple image aspects simultaneously, guided by text prompts, surpassing sequential methods in speed and accuracy.
